fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Digital Single Market Strategy, Data Protection Regulation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Elisa is a telecommunications, ICT and online service company serving 2.3 million consumer, corporate and public administration organisation customers. Elisa provides environmentally sustainable services for communication and entertainment, and tools for improving operating methods and productivity of organisations. In Finland Elisa is the market leader in mobile subscriptions. Cooperation with Vodafone and Telenor enables globally competitive services. Elisa is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki Large Cap with over 200 000 shareholders.  www.elisa.com
